Back to Edvard Grieg

Edvard Grieg

From Holberg’s Time, op. 40

1884

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 21'

  • 1. Prelude
  • 2. Sarabande
  • 3. Gavotte
  • 4. Air
  • 5. Rigaudon

Grieg also made an arrangement of the suite for string orchestra.

Recommended editions

  • Samlede Verker (Peters) · I/2 · Andre originalkomposisjoner · ed. Dag Schjelderup-Ebbe
  • Henle · HN 432 · ed. Ernst Herttrich / Einar Steen-Nøkleberg
  • Könemann · K 188 · Holberg-Suite and Moods, Song Arrangements · ed. Thomas Aßmus
  • Peters · EP 3100c · Piano Works / III / Arrangements of Own Works

1. Prelude

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. Sarabande

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Gavotte

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3

4. Air

Duration: 8' 30"

Difficulty: 3

5. Rigaudon

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3
